title: The Prodigy Sefiria’s Overpowering Program - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Demons   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Magic   Overpowered Protagonist   Programmer   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Wars
author: Ashitaka Takami   足高たかみ
description:
As someone who died because of overwork in some super black company, before I knew it, I already reincarnated as a baby named 『Sefiria』 in a world of sword and magic.

….. But, having been born in a poor village with no ability, God…. what are you trying to do?

As someone who’s forsaken by heaven, I’ve found some hope ——- that is the shocking truth about 「Magic Formula」 and 「Programming language」 resembling each other .

This is it, my story about crawling up from the depth of the abyss of 『Absolutely don’t want to work』

Note: The protagonist is born as a boy in WN version and a girl in the LN version.>
